response.overview: “Saksi ang Langit” (Heaven Is the Witness) is a heart-wrenching film about sin, love, and redemption. In a quiet village shrouded in secrets, one man struggles to confront his past. As he tries to bury the truth, only the heavens remain the silent witness to what he has done. The film asks: how far can forgiveness go and how long can the heavens stay silent?
response.title: Saksi ang Langit
